page.title: 07D.B. GARAGE
page.content: The garage at Drakes Broughton has been there since 1955. It is owned by{ {Mr. Millington}who has owned it for five years. They sell {Gulf petrol } which is 199.6p per gallon.The cars that they sell are TVR and FSO makes. They get approximately 130 customers a day and about a thousand a week. Their busiest day is{Christmas Eve.}There is not a car wash at the garage, but they do repairs. They employ twelve people, seven full time and five part time. Mr. Millington says that he would rather have his garage in a bigger town or city, because there would be more people, so that there would more customers.
